resource_dependency.stockDatabaseSchema: Create a database table named 'stocks' with fields: stock_id (primary key), symbol (string), company_name (string), sector (string), industry (string), market_cap (float), last_updated (datetime).
resource_dependency.stockSearchAPI: Integration with a stock data API such as Alpha Vantage or Yahoo Finance for real-time stock searching by symbol or name.

function: Enable users to search for stocks by entering either a stock code or company name.
static_description: A centered search bar at the top of the page with a placeholder text 'Enter stock code or company name', accompanied by a magnifying glass icon on the right side. Background is white, input field border is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search bar focuses the input field allowing text entry.
Pressing Enter after typing initiates the search query using the entered value.
Clicking the search icon submits the current input in the search bar.

resource_dependency.stockInfoSchema: Fields required: company_name (string), sector (string), industry (string), market_cap (float), current_price (float), price_change (float), percent_change (float)

function: Summarize essential stock information including company name, sector, industry, market cap, and latest price movement.
static_description: A card-style container below the search results showing summarized stock details. Includes company name header, sector/industry labels, market capitalization figure, and price changes. White background with navy text and borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking anywhere on the summary card navigates to the full stock detail/report generation view.

resource_dependency.reportGeneratorAPI: An external service like OpenAI GPT API for generating custom natural language reports based on selected parameters.
resource_dependency.reportStorageSchema: Table 'reports' with fields: report_id (primary key), user_id (foreign key), stock_symbol (string), created_at (datetime), content (text), format_type (string).

function: Generate customizable stock analysis reports tailored to user preferences.
static_description: A dedicated section within the stock detail view containing controls for selecting report parameters and a 'Generate Report' button. Layout includes checkboxes/dropdowns for sections and a blue 'Generate Report' button.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Generate Report' triggers the report creation process using selected options and displays the result in a new preview panel.

function: Allow users to choose their preferred format for exporting generated reports.
static_description: Horizontal row of icons/buttons labeled PDF, Markdown, Plain Text, HTML located above the report generation area. Each icon visually distinct but styled consistently with navy theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a format updates the export/download option accordingly when the report is ready.

resource_dependency.checkboxGroupStyle: Vertical stack of checkboxes with navy border and white fill, aligned left under a heading 'Include Sections'

function: Let users select which content sections they want included in their generated reports.
static_description: A vertical checklist group positioned next to the format selector titled 'Include Sections'. Options listed vertically with small square checkboxes beside each label.

interaction_and_states.description: Checking/unchecking boxes toggles inclusion of respective content blocks during report generation.

resource_dependency.dataFormatter: Function to convert raw numerical values into readable strings with appropriate units ($, %)

function: Display fundamental information about the selected stock in an organized manner.
static_description: Tabular layout presented in a bordered box showing key-value pairs of basic info. Table uses alternating row shading with headers in bold navy font against white background.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: D3.js or Chart.js library loaded via CDN
resource_dependency.trendDataSchema: Time series dataset including date (datetime) and closing_price (float)

function: Visualize historical performance and recent trends through interactive charts.
static_description: Interactive line chart occupying two-thirds width of screen beneath the basic info block. X-axis shows dates, Y-axis shows prices. Navy-colored lines with gridlines.

interaction_and_states.description: Mouse hovering over points on the chart reveals tooltip with exact date and price value.
Clicking legend items toggles visibility of different trend lines if multiple datasets are shown.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Fields: revenue (float), net_income (float), eps (float), pe_ratio (float), dividend_yield (float), debt_to_equity (float)
resource_dependency.externalFinancialAPI: An API providing quarterly and annual financial statements such as IEX Cloud or Financial Modeling Prep.

function: Integrate and display key financial indicators sourced from reliable external providers.
static_description: Collapsible accordion section titled 'Financial Overview' containing bullet-pointed financial stats. Content hidden until expanded. Navy-themed toggle arrow indicates expandable nature.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the section title expands/collanpses the detailed financial metrics panel.

function: Maintain consistent white background across all pages and components.
static_description: Entire webpage rendered with solid white background (#FFFFFF) applied globally via CSS body rule.

resource_dependency.buttonHoverEffect: Darken shade slightly on hover without changing base color definition

function: Apply uniform navy color scheme to interactive and structural elements throughout the site.
static_description: All buttons, input borders, icons, and highlight bars use navy (#000080) as primary accent color. Consistent styling applied site-wide.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons and clickable elements darken slightly upon mouseover while maintaining original shape and size.

resource_dependency.inputFieldStiling: Rounded corners, navy border, padding, focus glow effect
resource_dependency.formValidationMessage: Red error message appearing below invalid inputs stating 'Please enter valid stock code or name.'

function: Provide intuitive interface for submitting stock-related queries.
static_description: Form element featuring a single-line input box with rounded edges, navy outline, and subtle inner shadow when active. Label reads 'Search Stocks:' placed above the field.

interaction_and_states.description: Input gains keyboard focus and displays glowing border indicating readiness for typing.
If no text was entered before losing focus, placeholder reappears and validation errors show if needed.

function: Preview generated reports directly within the browser prior to downloading.
static_description: Modal overlay window displaying iframe-based preview of generated report content. Contains close button and download link. Overlay backdrop dims main page behind it.

interaction_and_states.description: Closing modal returns user back to previous view. Download link triggers file save dialog.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Client-side JavaScript function that converts report string/blob into downloadable file with correct MIME type

function: Permit users to save generated reports locally in various digital formats.
static_description: Dropdown menu near bottom-right corner of report viewer offering choices: 'Download as PDF', 'Save as Markdown', etc. Navy-statted caret icon opens dropdown list.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing an option starts client-side conversion and prompts native OS download prompt.

resource_dependency.realtimeDataProvider: WebSocket connection or polling mechanism connected to live stock ticker API such as Polygon.io or Alpaca Markets
resource_dependency.refreshInterval: Auto-refresh every 30 seconds unless manually refreshed sooner

function: Fetch up-to-the-minute stock pricing and metadata from authoritative financial sources.
static_description: Status indicator light in upper-right corner showing green circle when connected to live feed. Timestamp below says 'Last updated: HH:MM AM/PM'.

interaction_and_states.description: Manual refresh button forces immediate update request regardless of auto-refresh timer.

resource_dependency.topMenuBarHeight: 60px fixed position navbar spanning entire viewport width

function: Ensure seamless navigation between major sections of the application.
static_description: Fixed horizontal navigation bar at top featuring evenly spaced links labeled Home, Search, My Reports, Settings. Active tab highlighted subtly with underline or contrasting text color.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any menu item scrolls or redirects to associated section/view.
